description:
hiiiiii

This is not really a game, but more of an experimental environment?

How to play:

- use the mouse to rotate and zoom.

I was heavily inspired by glitch art and cyberpunk

I also wanted to learn more about shaders in unity and documented the stuff.  So if you are interested you can read the doc here.
